title: Create HAC and HACD Mixed Transfer Transaction
description: Create an atomic mixed transfer transaction of HAC and HACD. The transaction is atomic, it can only succeed simultaneously and will not allow one party to fail.
hacdInput1: Outgoing HACD, enter a comma-separated list of diamond literal values, max 200
hacAmount1: Outgoing HAC amount - Format, e.g.: '0.1' or '1:248'
hacdInput2: Outgoing HACD, enter a comma-separated list of diamond literal values, max 200
hacAmount2: Outgoing HAC amount - Format, e.g.: '0.1' or '1:248'
transactionTimeLimit: Optional: Transaction timestamp, current timestamp will be used if not filled
submitButton: Confirm Creation of HAC and HACD Atomic Swap Transaction
successTitle: HAC and HACD Atomic Swap Transaction Created Successfully!
successDescription: Please copy the [Transaction Body/txbody] content below, complete the signature operation first, then submit the transaction to the online wallet:
warning: Note: Do not enter your private key on this page!
instructions: 1. This transaction is a Hacash contract atomic transaction. The transaction is atomic and can only succeed simultaneously, not allowing one party to fail.
2. The transaction process is: Create contract => Verify contract content => Parties sign the contract => Submit the signed hxbody to the main network

a. All types of transactions can be created, but only HACD to HACD exchange, HAC to HACD exchange, one-way HACD transfer, and one-way HAC transfer are supported. HACD to HACD and HAC exchange is not supported.
b. The fee can be paid from a separate address used solely for fee payment
4. About verifying contract content and signing the contract:
a. First, download the desktop wallet => https://github.com/hacash/wallet/releases
b. To verify contract content, click => 'check tx content'
c. To sign the contract, click => 'sign the tx'
d. The above operations are all offline
5. Submit the signed contract to the main network, note that all parties need to sign => https://wallet.hacash.org
6. The transaction will be confirmed in the next block, check status after submission => https://wallet.hacash.org
note: (Note: Using this website to create a contract incurs a 0.2 HAC fee, please ensure that the HAC balance of the fee payment address is > 0.3 HAC, the 0.2 fee can be viewed on the contract content verification page)
